name: HSBC BANK USA NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as Trustee for Homestar Mortgage Acceptance Corporation, Asset Backed, Pass Through Certificates, Series 2004-6, Petitioner v. Drucylla J. CARTER, Respondent
name_abbreviation: HSBC Bank Usa National Ass'n v. Carter

parties: HSBC BANK USA NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as Trustee for Homestar Mortgage Acceptance Corporation, Asset Backed, Pass Through Certificates, Series 2004-6, Petitioner v. Drucylla J. CARTER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of January, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is REVERSED, and the case is REMANDED to the trial court. See Beneficial Consumer Discount Co. v. Vukman, 621 Pa. 192, 77 A.3d 547 (2013).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
83 A.3d 409
HSBC BANK USA NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as Trustee for Homestar Mortgage Acceptance Corporation, Asset Backed, Pass Through Certificates, Series 2004-6, Petitioner v. Drucylla J. CARTER, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 3, 2014.
